dct_title_s: Geologic map of the Avenal and La Cima quadrangles, Fresno and Kings Counties, California
dct_alternative_sm: Geology Avenal and La Cima quadrangle
dct_description_sm: by Thomas W. Dibblee, Jr. ; edited by John A. Minch.
Relief shown by contours and spot heights.

"Topographic base map from available USGS 7.5-minute quadrangle: Avenal, CA 1954, photorevised 1971, photoinspected 1978, DMA 1956 II SW -- Series V895; La Cima, CA 1963, photorevised 1971, photoinspected 1978, DMA 1956 II SE -- Series V895; Kettleman City, CA 1963, photorevised 1981, DMA 2056 III SW -- Series V895."
Includes quadrangle location map, index to adjacent 7.5 minute quadrangles, and index to sources of geology.
dct_publisher_sm: Santa Barbara Museum of Natural History
